articles.description: The original creators of the Xbox are reflecting on the early days of getting the console off of the ground.
articles.content: Microsoft once tried to acquire Nintendo and got laughed at. Back in the late 1990s, Microsoft was looking to get into the world of gaming. However, the chips were stacked against them from the start… [+2684 chars]

articles.author: Ian Carlos Campbell
articles.title: Intel launches RealSense ID, facial recognition tech that uses the company’s depth-sensing cameras - The Verge
articles.description: Intel announced the RealSense ID, a new addition to its depth-sensing camera tech for secure facial recognition. The device features a secure element for encrypting data and a neural network to adapt to changing faces over time.
articles.content:
Intel wants your face to replace your ID
Image: Intel
Intel launched RealSense ID yesterday, a facial recognition solution that relies on its RealSense depth-sensing technology (via Gizmodo). RealS… [+3216 chars]
